item.title: Singaporean businesses looking to invest in China can gain a competitive advantage at the recently established Singapore Centre in Guangzhou
item.description: Source: Ascendas. Companies from Singapore expanding their business into China now have access to a centralized service platform with the recent launch of the Singapore Centre at the Sino-Singapore Guangzhou Knowledge City (SSGKC). Known as Singapore Centre @SSGKC (Singapore Centre), this resource hub is situated within Ascendas OneHub GKC, an all-inclusive business park located within the SSGKC. The Singapore Centre consolidates key agencies and resources from both China and Singapore to offer comprehensive assistance for Singaporean companies investing in China.

item.title: Winners of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Awards are influential figures in promoting knowledge
item.description: Source: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Foundation. A representative from the MiSK Foundation receives the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Award. The Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Award recipients, celebrated on November 21st, share a common goal: shaping the future. This award acknowledges those who significantly contribute to the creation and dissemination of knowledge globally. Among the winners, Saudi Arabia’s MiSK Foundation focuses on developing educational institutions and bolstering scientific research.
